summary.span: 为派生自此类的所有验证控件提供核心实现。

span.span: Provides the core implementation for all validation controls derived from this class.

summary.span: 作为抽象类，它不能被实例化。

span.span: As an abstract class, it cannot be instantiated.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类继承自基类，并因此具有属性。The class inherits from the base class, and thus has a property. 发生时存在无效条目，验证程序显示的值属性。In the event of an invalid entry, the validator displays the value of the property. 如果未设置该属性，验证程序显示的值属性替换; 这是文本中所示控件。If the property is not set, the validator displays the value of the property instead; this is the text that is shown in the control. 此行为在与 Web 窗体验证一致。This behavior is consistent with Web Forms validators. ASP.NET 移动控件，这些支持验证都是控件 (其属性) 和控件 (其属性)。Of the ASP.NET mobile controls, those that support validation are the control (its property) and the control (its property). 其他控件可以参与验证通过包括属性。Other controls can participate in validation by including a attribute. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 验证针对特定值的 ASP.NET 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3db6f7e6-ad52-42cf-a429-c2aaa7d64ed7)文档。For more information, see the [How to: Validate Against a Specific Value for ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3db6f7e6-ad52-42cf-a429-c2aaa7d64ed7) documentation.

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两种方式使用此属性。This property is used in two ways. 首先，如果不存在的值属性、 的值属性使用在其原位置。First, if there is no value for the property, the value of the property is used in its place. 第二个，当使用控件，摘要将使用的值每个验证程序，它表示的无效控件的属性。Second, when the control is used, the summary uses the value of the property for each validator that represents an invalid control.
